entry.title: Apple Universal control is the future

link.title: Apple Universal control is the future

entry.summary:
What is Apple Universal Control ?
When Apple announced Universal Control, I thought it is too good to be true. A single peripheral device control multiple machines without any setup? That‚Äôs something peripheral devices manufactures like Logitech are offering with keyboard that can toggle among input devices but not as smoothly as Universal Control can deliver. entry.title: DNS Over HTTPs and security aspects from individual and enterprise

link.title: DNS Over HTTPs and security aspects from individual and enterprise

entry.summary:
What is DNS Over HTTPs (DoH)?
Standard DNS (on tcp/udp port 53) works just fine but missing security features to prevent tampering of its plaintext DNS request to the DNS providers. It leads to security issues such as DNS Cache Poisoning and typo-squatting domains.
DNS Over HTTPs (DoH) brings TLS/SSL encapsulation on HTTP traffic to boost security integrity issues of spoofing and tampering of...

entry.title: My 2020/2021
entry.summary:
2020 is a tough year for everyone. For me, there is some months like house arrest alone. A year passed by and we are in 2021 with changes in our daily life style and the way we live, work and enjoy life. People are fighting for this virus outbreak but most people believe in our survival instinct and health system.
